subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: After an opening-round victory in the Champions League, Real Madrid's coach, José Mourinho, and its star player, Cristiano Ronaldo, have reason to smile, at least until the next match.
snippet: After an opening-round victory in the Champions League, Real Madrid's coach, José Mourinho, and its star player, Cristiano Ronaldo, have reason to smile, at least until the next match.
